headline: Assessing FirstEnergy (FE) Valuation As Long Term Returns Contrast With Recent Share Price Softness
summary: Why FirstEnergy is on investors’ radar now FirstEnergy (FE) has been drawing fresh attention as investors reassess the utility’s recent share performance and earnings profile, with the stock last closing at $44.65 amid mixed short term returns. See our latest analysis for FirstEnergy. Although the recent 7 day and 90 day share price returns have been slightly negative, FirstEnergy’s 1 year and 5 year total shareholder returns of 20.15% and 73.34% point to momentum that has been stronger over...
